thread.title: Nine places where you can smoke marijuana legally (including North Korea)
thread.title_full: Nine places where you can smoke marijuana legally (including North Korea)

title: Nine places where you can smoke marijuana legally (including North Korea)
text:
Previous slide Next slide 1 of 9 View All Skip Ad 
You'd be forgiven for letting this pass you by yesterday - there was some other slightly more important news breaking across the pond - but California, Nevada and Massachusetts have legalised the use of marijuana. 
In a vote that ran alongside the presidential election, residents approved the growth and consumption of cannabis for anyone over the age of 21. The drug was already cleared for medical use in California - but can now be used recreationally. 
So you can now smoke the reefer in places such as LA or San Francisco, pictured, but where else in the world is it legal to blaze up? Read on to find out. Fotolia/AP
